French_text: J'ai la nostalgie du pain de ma mère,
English_text: I'm nostalgic for my mother's bread,
My mother's coffee,
My mother's caresses...
And childhood grows inside me,
Day after day,

French_text: Et je chéris ma vie, car
English_text: And I cherish my life, because
If I died,

French_text: J'aurais honte des larmes de ma mère !
English_text: I'd be ashamed of my mother's tears!

French_text: Fais de moi, si je rentre un jour,
English_text: Make me, if I ever return,
A shade for your eyelids.

French_text: Recouvre mes os de cette herbe
English_text: Cover my bones with this grass
Baptized under your innocent heels.
Tie me up

French_text: Avec une mèche de tes cheveux,
English_text: With a lock of your hair,

French_text: Un fil qui pend à l'ourlet de ta robe...
English_text: A thread that hangs from the hem of your dress...

French_text: Et je serai, peut-être, un dieu,
English_text: And I'll be, perhaps, a god,
Perhaps a god,
If I touch your heart!
Set me, if I ever return
In your oven as fuel to help you cook,
And hang me,

French_text: Corde à linge, sur le toit de ta maison.
English_text: On your roof as a clothesline stretched in your hands.
I can no longer stand
Without your daily prayers.

French_text: J'ai vieilli. Ramène les étoiles de l'enfance
English_text: I've grown old. Bring back the stars of childhood
Bring back the stars of childhood

French_text: Et je partagerai avec les petits des oiseaux,
English_text: And I'll share with the little birds,
The way back...
To the nest of your expectation!
